text: Di madagoaa digau Amor ne llele ia gi lala i nia gonduu gi daha mo digau dauwa o Israel, Dimaadua gaa hai dana uwa hadu magalillili gii doo gi hongo digaula gaa tugi loo i Azekah. Nia daangada ala ne daaligi go di uwa hadu magalillili la gu dogologo i nia daangada ala ne daaligi go digau Israel.
